item.title: Global Manager Engineering & Maintenance
item.description:
• Job Requisition group
    • Ref ID: JR103654
    • Job Post Loc: Enkhuizen
    • Country: Netherlands
    • Job Description:

      Ready to lead a global (Engineering) team and drive innovation in seed processing?

      This is why you want to join us as Global Manager Engineering & Maintenance at Enza Zaden

      • You will lead the Global Engineering & Maintenance Organization: you will build and lead an engaged and highly capable Enza Zaden's global Engineering & Maintenance team.

      • You will build the Global Seed Processing Capabilities: develop and implement the strategic global Engineering Portfolio, to expand and enhance Enza Zaden's global seed processing capabilities with top-quality seed processing and advanced packaging technologies, contributing to an efficient and reliable global Seed Processing operation.

      • You will join Enza Zaden, a growing, dynamic and leading seed company: become part and contribute to Enza Zaden's growth in which you can make a real difference.

      Make a difference as Global Manager Engineering & Maintenance

      As the Global Manager Engineering & Maintenance, you will:

      • Lead, motivate, coach, and develop your team (direct 8-10, indirect 15-20 people) to ensure optimal performance and team dynamics;

      • Implement global best practice maintenance work processes and systems to improve HS&E, product quality, reliability, and uptime;

      • Manage the global Seed Processing CAPEX and OPEX budgets, including annual budget preparation and alignment processes;

      • Participate in relevant management teams and lead large projects and programs with cross-functional teams;

      • Define and set the global Engineering & Maintenance training and skills development program;

      • Ensure successful project delivery and build alignment across senior and executive management.

      You will report to the VP Supply Chain and collaborate closely with various internal stakeholders, including the COO, Directors, Global Managers, Site Processing Managers and the Seed Research & Innovation Director. Externally, you will manage relationships with equipment, system, and service providers.

      What you bring as a future colleague

      • Academic educational background in Engineering or Operations Management;

      • Minimum 15 years, of which 10 years of leadership experience, in a food, agricultural, or chemical manufacturing business;

      • Strong leadership experience within complex facilities;

      • High collaborative working skills and the ability to communicate effectively across all levels;

      • Willing to travel internationally (10-20%);

      • Proficiency in Dutch and English, both written and verbal.

      Enza Zaden as your employer

      With more than 3,000 passionate team members across the world, we're on a daily mission to develop the finest vegetable varieties. Our goal? To deliver seeds with that special something: vegetables with better taste, better yields, and better resistance. On our mission to feed the world, we challenge ourselves to gain deeper insights and find the next breakthrough. We grow and innovate together, and everyone’s contribution is valued. Throughout our 86 years, our family values, passion, independence and or focus on innovation have truly set us apart. Over 480 million people are eating our vegetables every day, something we are very proud of! Our passion isn't just a trademark; it's our driving force, propelling our rapid growth. If you're ready to explore your potential and thrive in a supportive environment, we welcome you to develop your talents with us. The combination of entrepreneurship, initiative and a healthy dose of determination has made Enza Zaden great and brought us where we are today. Enza Zaden is and always will be in motion: in the past, present and future. 

      What can you expect from us

      As a family-owned company, we support you to thrive in all areas of life, so that you can be successful inside and outside of work. We offer:

      • Flexible work arrangements;

      • Access to a variety of wellbeing programs and healthy food options;

      • 25 paid vacation days (employees have the option to buy extra vacation days equivalent to two times their weekly working hours);

      • 1 paid vitality day for all, plus extra days as your age increases;

      • Contribution for overnight stays if you live further away from Enza Zaden;  

      • Laptop + smartphone.

      We aspire to be a good employer that cares for our employees, both during and after their careers at Enza Zaden. Our most important benefits include:

      • Active partnership in your professional development (personal growth);

      • Tailor made leadership development programs and global e-learning platform;

      • Employer sponsored retirement benefits.

      Join us for a career that grows with you! Are you curious to know more about Enza Zaden click on this link to our website.

      Get in touch

      Apply now using the application button. You will receive an automatic confirmation of your application within minutes, and we will respond to your application within 10 working days. 

       

      Do you have any questions about our application process? Please feel free to reach out to:

      Marjolijn Woudstra

      Senior Recruitment Business Partner a.i.

      m.woudstra@enzazaden.nl

        

      Good to know

      • A Business Case Assessment is part of the application process; 

      • This position cannot be filled on an interim basis;

      • Enza Zaden is an equal opportunity employer and does not discriminate based on background, identity or personal characteristics.

    • Employee Type: Permanent

    • Prim Recr mail: ja.kaagman@enzazaden.nl

item.title: Junior Breeder
item.description:
• Job Requisition group
    • Ref ID: JR103582
    • Job Post Loc: Santa Croce Camerina (RG)
    • Country: Italy
    • Job Description:

      This is why you want to join us as Junior Breeder at Enza Zaden


      • Be part of an international tomato team in a mission-driven company improving vegetable varieties for a better future
      • Work in an inspiring, innovative environment while contributing locally

      Make a difference as Junior Breeder

      As a Junior Breeder, your main goal is to develop into a successful Breeder in your assigned crop. Your main tasks are:

      • Translate breeding targets into operational breeding plans
      • Support plant and line selections during key breeding stages
      • Keep detailed records throughout breeding cycles
      • Assist in decisions on material advancement and planning of trials
      • Learn to hand over R3 material to Seed Production and register in the system (e.g., Varmas)
      • Implement new technologies and traits into the breeding program

      You will be part of a local breeding team, directly reporting to the Senior Breeder, with whom you will work closely. You’ll operate at an operational level within a defined country scope.

      What you bring as a future colleague

      • Bachelor of Science (HBO/Bachelor level) in a relevant field
      • Proficiency in English and the local language, both written and verbal
      • High attention to detail and organizational skills
      • Eagerness to learn and a proactive attitude
      • Ability to work both independently and collaboratively
      • Resilience to work under different weather and climate conditions
      • Openness to feedback and close supervision

      This role is ideal for someone at the start of their career, motivated to learn and grow in a dynamic and hands-on environment. You’ll be guided step-by-step to take on more responsibilities and build expertise in breeding.

      Enza Zaden as your employer

      With more than 3,000 passionate team members across the world, we're on a daily mission to develop the finest vegetable varieties. Our goal? To deliver seeds with that special something: vegetables with better taste, better yields, and better resistance. On our mission to feed the world, we challenge ourselves to gain deeper insights and find the next breakthrough. We grow and innovate together, and everyone’s contribution is valued. Throughout our 86 years, our family values, passion, independence and our focus on innovation have truly set us apart. Over 480 million people are eating our vegetables every day, something we are very proud of! Our passion isn't just a trademark; it's our driving force, propelling our rapid growth. The combination of entrepreneurship, initiative and a healthy dose of determination has made Enza Zaden great and brought us where we are today. item.title: Manager d'équipes de sélection / Crop Breeding Manager
item.description:
• Job Requisition group
    • Ref ID: JR101398
    • Job Post Loc: CHATEAURENARD
    • Country: France
    • Job Description:

      Pourquoi nous rejoindre chez Enza Zaden ?

      • Votre travail contribue à rendre accessible, à la population mondiale, des légumes sains et variés ;

      • C'est intégrer une entreprise familiale internationale et indépendante très engagée dans l'innovation pour la recherche et le développement des compétences de ses collaborateurs(trices).

      Ce que nous attendons d'un(e) Responsable / Manager d'équipes de sélection ?

      En tant que Responsable / Manager d'équipes de sélection, vous êtes responsable du succès des programmes de sélection Courge et Courgette.

      Vous aurez les responsabilités principales suivantes :

      • Management des équipes de sélection (sélectionneurs et assistants).

      • Gestion de l'aspect opérationnel de la sélection en assurant un suivi régulier des performances.

      • Collaboration étroite avec les sélectionneurs dans leurs essais en supervisant les projets de recherche, de production de semences, les plans d'essai et le processus des tests maladie en routine.

      • Rôle actif dans les programmes de sélection avec une veille active des nouvelles techniques et technologies pour intégration dans les programmes.

      • Membre des équipes de management internationale pour les espèces Courge et Courgette

      Basé(e) sur notre station de recherche de Châteaurenard (France) idéalement ou sur notre station de recherche l'Almeria (Espagne) ou de Voorst (Pays-Bas), vous aurez des interactions régulières avec votre équipe, vos collègues sur place ainsi qu’à l’étranger avec des déplacements professionnels réguliers.

      Ce que vous apportez en tant que futur(e) collègue ?

      • Vous appréciez l’interaction avec des équipes multidisciplinaires.

      • Vous êtes reconnu(e) pour vos qualités relationnelles et de communication.

      • Vous êtes un(e) leader(euse) naturel(le) doté(e) d'une aptitude à connecter, développer et motiver les membres de votre équipe.

      • Doté(e) d’un esprit vif, vous savez quand passer à la vitesse supérieure et êtes en mesure de prendre des décisions rapides si nécessaire.

      • Vous avez un esprit créatif avec une forte persévérance pour faire avancer les choses.

      • Vous êtes curieux(se) avec une soif d'apprendre.

      En bref, vous :

      • Être titulaire d’un master ou diplôme d’ingénieur en agricole, agronomie, amélioration des plantes, plant breeding ou diplôme équivalent.

      • Vous avez fait vos preuves sur un poste similaire avec plusieurs années d'expérience en management d’équipe.

      • Vous êtes prêt(e) à voyager fréquemment.

      • Vous avez à l'aise en communication et en management des parties prenantes.

      • Vous êtes créatif(ve), impliqué(e) et persévérant(e).

      • Vous êtes flexible et pragmatique.

      • Vous maîtrisez la langue anglaise (niveau professionnel).

      Enza Zaden comme employeur

      Enza Zaden est une entreprise de sélection variétale qui développe des variétés potagères. Nous produisons et vendons les semences de ces variétés aux producteurs partout dans le monde, qu’ils soient installés en agriculture conventionnelle ou biologique.

      Notre ambition est de donner aux populations un accès à des légumes sains et variés partout dans le monde. Avec plus de 2800 collègues passionnés à travers le monde, nous collaborons quotidiennement pour développer les légumes de demain.

      Rejoignez-nous pour une carrière qui évolue avec vous ! Êtes-vous curieux d'en apprendre davantage sur Enza Zaden ? Cliquez sur ce lien.

      Contactez-nous

      Postulez dès maintenant en cliquant sur « Postuler » et transmettre votre candidature en anglais. Vous recevrez une confirmation automatique immédiate, et nous vous répondrons dans les meilleurs délais.

      Vous avez des questions sur notre processus de recrutement ? N'hésitez pas à contacter le service Ressources Humaines à : recrutement@enzazaden.fr

      --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

      Why join Enza Zaden?

      • Your work contributes to everyone's worldwide access to healthy and varied vegetables; 

      • It means joining an international and independent family owned company that is highly committed to innovation in research and to our employees development.

      What do we expect from a Crop Breeding Manager ?

      As Crop Breeding Manager, you are responsible for the success of the Squash and Pumpkin breeding programs.

      Your main responsibilities will include:

      • Managing the breeding teams (breeders and assistants).

      • Leading the operational aspect of breeding by regularly monitoring performance.

      • Working closely with the breeders in their trials by overseeing the research projects, seed production, trial plans, and routine disease testing processes.

      • Actively participating in breeding programs and staying up to date on the new techniques and technologies and insuring the integration into the breeding programs.

      • Being a member of the international crop management teams for squash and pumpkin.

      Based at our research station in Châteaurenard (South of France) ideally, or at our research station in Almeria (Spain) or Voorst (Netherlands), you will have regular interactions with your team, colleagues on-site, and abroad with regular business trips.

      What do you bring as a future colleague ?

      • You enjoy interacting with multidisciplinary teams.

      • You are recognized for your interpersonal and communication skills.

      • You are a natural leader with the ability to connect, develop, and motivate your team members.

      • With a sharp mind, you know when to step up the pace and can make quick decisions if necessary.

      • You have a creative spirit with strong perseverance to get things done.

      • You are curious with a strong desire to learn.

      In short, you:

      • Have a master's degree or engineering degree in agriculture, agronomy, plant sciences, plant breeding, or any equivalent studies.

      • Have proven yourself in a similar position with several years of team management experience.

      • Are ready to travel frequently.

      • Are at ease with communication and stakeholder management.

      • Are creative, involved, and persistent.

      • Are flexible and pragmatic.

      • Are proficient in the English language.

      Enza Zaden as an employer

      Enza Zaden is a vegetable breeding company that develops vegetable varieties. We produce and sell the seeds of these varieties to growers worldwide whether they are engaged in conventional or organic agriculture.

      Our ambition is to provide the population with access to healthy and varied vegetables worldwide. With more than 2800 passionate colleagues all over the world, we work together every day on the vegetables of tomorrow.

      If you're ready to explore your potential and thrive in a supportive environment, we welcome you to develop your talents with us.

      Are you curious to learn more about Enza Zaden? Click on this link.

      Contact us

      Apply now using the application button. You will receive immediately an automatic confirmation of your application, and we will respond to your application as soon as possible.

      Do you have any questions about our recruitment process? Please feel free to reach out to the Human Resources department at: recrutement@enzazaden.fr.

    • Employee Type: Permanent
    • Prim Recr: Jolene Ovenden
    • Prim Recr mail: j.ovenden@enzazaden.fr
    • Prim Recr Phone: +33 (6) 01850964
    • Int Posting URL: https://wd103.myworkday.com/enzazaden/d/inst/1$9925/9925$3508.htmld

item.title: Laboratory Technician
item.description:
• Job Requisition group
    • Ref ID: JR103543
    • Job Post Loc: El Ejido
    • Country: Spain
    • Job Description:

      Reporting to

      Team Lead Applications / Procces Supervisor / Manager Quality Assurance (local)

      Purpose

      Execution of a selection of routine tests/productions on seed and plant material, according to precise regulations and protocols, directions and/or instructions, to establish (product) quality data and/or as part of research programmes.

      Geographical scope

      1 country

      Operational level

      Operational

      Key accountabilities

      1. Independent execution and assessment of a selection of routine tests/productions and the administrative processing thereof.
      2. Recording of own results in designated systems and signalling abnormalities.
      3. Correct use of all basic equipment and simple troubleshooting of this equipment.
      4. Reading, understanding, interpreting, applying and selecting all protocols for the tests/productions to be executed, and signalling errors. 5. Planning of own daily activities and, where appropriate, the activities of lower level Laboratory Technicians.
      6. Induction and functional guidance of lower level Laboratory Technicians, and possibly interns.
      7. Co-responsible for a healthy and safe work environment.

      Main internal contacts

      * Colleagues within the own department - Exchange information, explain facts/practice

      * Internal other departments - Exchange information, explain facts/practice, give advice, provide results and any abnormalities

      * International Enza branches - Exchanging information, explaining facts/practice, giving advice

      Main external contacts

      N/a

      N/a

      # indirect reports

      N/a

      Financial responsibilities

      Revenue: N/a

      Budget: N/a

      Minimum working and thinking level

      Secondary vocational level (MBO, Associate's degree)

      Minimum years of relevant work experience

      1 to 2 years

      Required certifications, knowledge and skills

      * Ability to work with all relevant systems/basic equipment
      * Ability to work with different crops and chemicals in the prescribed and safe manner
      * Proficient in the local and English language, both written and verbal

      Working conditions

      * Occasionally works under time pressure
      * Occasionally unvarying/strenuous posture
      * Risk of injury when using chemical/toxic substances

      Level distinctive key accountabilities

      N/a

item.title: Sales Manager
item.description:
• Job Requisition group
    • Ref ID: JR103688
    • Job Post Loc: Den Haag
    • Country: Netherlands
    • Job Description:

      Wil jij de commerciële verantwoordelijkheid voor onze klanten en rassen (mn. Tomaat) binnen de België, Nederland en Scandinavië regio? Het vertalen van marktonwikkelingen, klantontwikkelingen en klantbehoeften verder vertaalt naar de organisatie? Dan is de functie van Sales Manager binnen Enza Zaden een afwisselende rol voor jou. Je richt je op het snijvlak van verkoop, leiderschap en ondernemerschap.

      Dit is waarom je als Sales Manager bij Enza Zaden wil komen werken

      • Innovatieve werkomgeving: Werk met de nieuwste technologieën en methoden in de agrarische sector.

      • Internationale samenwerking: Werk samen met collega's en klanten in Nederland, België en Scandinavië.

      • Groeimogelijkheden: Ontwikkel jezelf binnen een dynamisch en groeiend bedrijf.

      Maak het verschil als Sales Manager

      • Ontwikkel verkoopactiviteiten die bijdragen aan de bedrijfsdoelstellingen.

      • Beheer budgettering, forecasting en prijsbeleid binnen het marktgebied.

      • Verantwoordelijk voor (key-)accountmanagement en de implementatie van prijsstrategieën.

      • Aansturen, ontwikkelen, coachen en begeleiden van een team met sales specialisten.

      • Verzamel markt- en klantdata voor de ontwikkeling van marketingplannen.

      Wat jij meebrengt als toekomstige collega

      • Minimaal hbo werk- en denkniveau, bij voorkeur in een relevante richting zoals Internationale (Agrarische) Handel, Bedrijfskunde of Commerciële Economie.

      • Enkele jaren ervaring in een commercieel (leidinggevende) functie, bij voorkeur in de groenten- en/of sierteelt.

      • Goede mondelinge en schriftelijke beheersing van de Nederlandse en Engelse taal.

      • Inzicht in en ervaring met moderne ICT-tools en het omzetten van data in informatie.

      Verder ben je ondernemend, energiek, initiatiefrijk en beschik je over een service- en resultaatgerichte instelling. In deze functie komt het vaak aan op jouw mensgerichte managementvaardigheden.

      Door goed te luisteren naar het salesteam mag jij ideeën gaan vertalen in commerciële en creatieve acties, om zo bestaande klanten verder te helpen en nieuwe deuren te openen!

      Jij hebt een achtergrond in de agrarische sector en kunt goed plannen & organiseren.

      Gezien jouw ‘commerciële antenne’ weet je als geen ander wat er in de markt gebeurt en speelt daar handig en creatief op in. Hierbij is een duidelijke visie en goed stakeholdermanagement van doorslaggevend belang. Daarnaast is het belangrijk om alle afspraken zo duidelijk mogelijk vast te leggen

      Enza Zaden als jouw werkgever 

      Met meer dan 3.000 gepassioneerde collega’s wereldwijd, zetten we ons dagelijks in om de beste groenterassen te ontwikkelen. Ons doel? Zaden leveren die zorgen voor groente met een betere smaak, hogere opbrengsten en een betere resistentie. Tijdens onze missie om de wereld te voeden, streven we ernaar diepere inzichten te krijgen en de volgende doorbraak te vinden. We groeien en innoveren samen en ieders bijdrage hierin is waardevol. Al ruim 86 jaar leiden onze familiewaarden, passie, onafhankelijkheid en focus op innovatie tot succes. Dagelijks eten ruim 480 miljoen mensen onze groenten, iets waar we enorm trots op zijn! Onze passie is niet alleen een handelsmerk; het is onze drijvende kracht, die onze snelle groei voortstuwt. Als jij klaar bent voor een volgende stap in een fijne werkomgeving, nodigen we je van harte uit om te solliciteren en je talenten bij ons verder te ontwikkelen. De combinatie van ondernemerschap, initiatief en een gezonde dosis doorzettingsvermogen heeft Enza Zaden gebracht tot waar we nu zijn. Enza Zaden is en blijft in beweging: in het verleden, het heden en de toekomst. 

      Wat kun je van ons verwachten

      Als familiebedrijf ondersteunen we je in alle levensgebieden, zodat je succesvol kunt zijn binnen en buiten het werk. We bieden:

      • Flexibele werkregelingen;

      • Toegang tot verschillende welzijnsprogramma's en gezonde voedingsopties;

      • 25 betaalde vakantiedagen (werknemers hebben de optie om extra vakantiedagen te kopen ter waarde van twee keer hun wekelijkse arbeidsuren);

      • 1 betaalde vitaliteitsdag voor iedereen, plus extra dagen naarmate je ouder wordt;

      • Leaseauto;

      • Laptop + smartphone.

      We streven ernaar een goede werkgever te zijn die om medewerkers geeft, zowel tijdens als na hun carrière bij Enza Zaden. Onze belangrijkste voordelen zijn onder andere:

      • Actieve samenwerking in jouw professionele ontwikkeling (persoonlijke groei);

      • Op maat gemaakte ontwikkelingsprogramma's en een wereldwijd e-learningplatform;

      • Aantrekkelijke pensioensregeling.

      Sluit je bij ons aan voor een carrière die met jou meegroeit! Wil je meer weten over Enza Zaden? Klik op deze link naar onze website.

      Laten we in contact komen

      Solliciteer nu via de sollicitatieknop (niet later dan 25 mei 2024). Je ontvangt binnen enkele minuten een automatische bevestiging en we reageren binnen 10 werkdagen op je sollicitatie.

      Heb je vragen over ons sollicitatieproces? Neem dan gerust contact op met:

      Sandra Hoeneveld, Corporate Recruiter

      s.hoeneveld@enzazaden.nl

       

      Goed om te weten

      • Een assessment maakt deel uit van het sollicitatieproces (een OPQ is een persoonlijkheidsvragenlijst en geen assessment);

      • Deze functie kan niet interim worden ingevuld;

      • Enza Zaden is een werkgever die gelijke kansen biedt en discrimineert niet op basis van achtergrond, identiteit of persoonlijke kenmerken;

      Acquisitie naar aanleiding van deze vacature wordt niet op prijs gesteld. 

    • Employee Type: Permanent
    • Prim Recr: Sandra Irene Hoeneveld - Blekkink
    • Prim Recr mail: s.hoeneveld-blekkink@enzazaden.nl
    • Prim Recr Phone: +31 (6) 15540956
    • Int Posting URL: https://wd103.myworkday.com/enzazaden/d/inst/1$9925/9925$3529.htmld

item.title: Commercial Coordinator (subsidiary)
item.description:
• Job Requisition group
    • Ref ID: JR102929
    • Job Post Loc: Salinas
    • Country: United States of America
    • Job Description:

      COMMERCIAL COORDINATOR (subsidiary)

      Enza Zaden is looking for a highly motivated Commercial Coordinator to join our team in the United States.

      What will you do as a Commercial Coordinator?

      As Commercial Coordinator, you ensure optimization of inventory level and maintain a well-organized seed supply chain within the subsidiary in collaboration with Seed Operations stakeholders, while facilitating communication and coordination for Marketing & Sales stakeholders, providing timely and relevant information on product availability according to customer demands.

      • Collaborate with Product Managers and Sales Managers regarding active portfolio materials.
      • Develop SKU forecasts in accordance with open order data and replenishment plans.
      • Proactively communicate availability updates within customer orders.
      • Support Marketing and Sales by collecting and analyzing data related to forecast demands.
      • Work closely with counterparts in Europe to assure timely delivery of local seed needs.
      • Review quality specifications and manage surpluss or obsolete stock.
      • Other duties as required.

      Your power

      As a Commercial Coordinator, you have a good understanding how the supply chain works and want to be part of a growing company. You are well spoken, driven and want to serve our customers efficiently. You work as a linking pin and main contact for Marketing and Sales, along with Supply Chain, providing timely updates regarding seed availability.

      You are a dynamic person who takes initiative, is highly collaborative, and has an organized method of working. You can work independently, but you are also able to work in a cross-functional teams and intercultural project teams.

      • Bachelor’s Degree preferably in administration, economics, or logistics.
      • 6+ years of relevant work experience within the vegetable seed industry preferred.
      • Professional, assertive, and clear communication skills (verbal and written).
      • Strong analytical skills with a keen eye for detail, able to interrogate data and produce detailed outputs.
      • Occasional business travel (< 10% of the working time)
      • Must possess a valid driver’s license and clean driving record.

      Compensation & Benefits:

      The following information is provided in good faith as a general description of the starting pay range and benefits for the position posted. The compensation offered to the successful candidate depends on experience, skills, education, work location, and other objective job-related factors.

      Starting salary pay range: $79,208 - $85,000

      Enza Zaden offers an attractive benefits package that includes medical, dental, and vision coverage, life insurance, and disability coverage for full-time positions. Other benefits include 401(k) with employer match, paid personal time off, paid volunteer time off, monthly fitness reimbursement, and a free Employee Assistance Program (EAP). More information regarding the benefits will be shared during the application process.

      Our power

      Enza Zaden is a vegetable breeding company that develops vegetable varieties. We produce and sell the seeds of these varieties all over the world. Both for conventional and organic growers. In order to explain this properly (and as briefly as possible) we have made an animation. For more than 80 years we are working with the best that nature offers. We support this with state-of-the-art technologies to speed up our breeding process. That is necessary, because currently the development of a new vegetable variety takes up 6 to 10 years.


      The results? Strong, healthy, tasty, and climate-proof vegetable varieties with higher yield per square meter and less need of crop protection products or fertilizer.


      Our strength? More than 2000 passionate colleagues worldwide working together on the vegetables of tomorrow. Therefore, we continuously invest in knowledge and skills.

      Interested? Please submit your cover letter and resume via the following link: https://www.enzazaden.com/

    • Employee Type: At-Will
    • Prim Recr: Ricardo Antonio López Ortiz
    • Prim Recr mail: r.lopez-ortiz@enzazaden.com.mx
    • Int Posting URL: https://wd103.myworkday.com/enzazaden/d/inst/1$9925/9925$3531.htmld

item.title: IT Specialist Region
item.description:
• Job Requisition group
    • Ref ID: JR103620
    • Job Post Loc: El Ejido
    • Country: Spain
    • Job Description:

      IT SPECIALIST – South Europe and North Africa

      Enza Zaden is seeking a highly motivated IT Specialist to join our Global IT team. The position will be based in Almeria or Murcia Spain.

      What will you do?

      Due to the significant growth of our organization and the realization of our digital journey, we have created the IT Specialist position for the South Europe and North Africa Region. As part of our global IT department, you will lead and contribute to expanding and enhancing our IT environment, ensuring a high-quality user experience for our team members, you will be:

      • Responsible for the adequate solution, communication, and coordination of incidents and requests.

      • Accountable for using the security and compliance protocols, and procedures to prevent potential threats and continuously improve the IT service(s).

      • Responsible for the vision and strategy roadmap for 1-3 years, budget, licensing, upgrades, and lifecycle management.

      • Responsible for workstation management (delivery, upgrades, life cycle management, tracking of company property, and performance monitoring).

      • Other duties as needed to support the department goals.

      ​Your power

      You are someone who takes initiative, is professional, assertive, and a great communicator. You can work independently; however, you enjoy working in cross-functional teams.

      • Bachelor’s degree in information technology, Computer Science, or a related field preferred.

      • Minimum 5 years of experience preferred.

      • Manage global supplier relationships to meet SLAs and deliver value, with a focus on enhancing user experience in the South Europe and North Africa.

      • You are a proactive professional with excellent communication skills tailored to user needs, and you excel in global cross-functional teamwork and aligning with stakeholders.

      • Must be fluent in English, understanding, speaking, and writing.

      • Bilingual in Spanish and English is necessary.

      • Proficient in software applications (Microsoft Office, Dynamics, ERP, CRM, HR systems, and AI).

      • You have a valid driver’s license, and you are an eligible driver under the company insurance policy.

      • Occasional travel, domestic and international (20%).

      This role is ideal for someone who is not only technically proficient but also deeply committed to creating a positive, efficient, and satisfying IT experience for our users across the South Europe and North Africa.

      Compensation & Benefits:

      The following information is provided in good faith as a general description of the pay range and benefits for the position posted. The compensation offered to the successful candidate depends on experience, skills, education, work location, and other objective job-related factors.

      Enza Zaden offers an attractive benefits package that includes medical, dental, and vision coverage, life insurance, and disability coverage for full-time positions.

      Our power

      Enza Zaden is a vegetable breeding company that develops vegetable varieties. And produces and sells its seeds all over the world. We have made an animation to explain what we do to you properly (and as briefly as possible). The purpose of our work? To offer everyone worldwide access to healthy and varied vegetables. With more than 2000 passionate colleagues all over the world, we work together every day on the vegetables of tomorrow.

      Would you like to know more about Enza Zaden as an employer? Then take a look at the Careers & Learning.

item.title: Stage Health Safety & Environment
item.description:
• Job Requisition group
    • Ref ID: JR103727
    • Job Post Loc: Enkhuizen
    • Country: Netherlands
    • Job Description:

      Enza Zaden is een toonaangevende internationale organisatie in de veredeling en productie van groentezaden. Enza Zaden zet zich in voor een veilige en duurzame werkomgeving. Ter versterking van ons Health, Safety, en Environment (HSE) team zijn wij op zoek naar een gemotiveerde en leergierige stagiair(e).

      Maak het verschil als stagiair(e) HSE

      Als stagiair(e) HSE ondersteun je het team bij diverse werkzaamheden op het gebied van gezondheid, veiligheid en milieu. Je krijgt de kans om praktische ervaring op te doen en je kennis toe te passen in een dynamische en professionele omgeving.

      Je mag meewerken aan de volgende projecten;

      • Helpen bij het opzetten en verder uitbreiden van crisismanagement;
      • Het ontwikkelen van veiligheidsinstructies/e-learnings etc. die toegevoegd kunnen worden aan de safety awareness campaign;
      • De afdeling ondersteunen bij het geven van advies en helpen maken/verbeteren van procedures en beleid omtrent o.a.: veilig verkeer, intern transport, werkvergunningen of andere veiligheidsonderwerpen die actueel zijn binnen Enza Zaden.

      Wat jij meebrengt als toekomstige stagiaire bij Enza Zaden

      Heb je een goed begrip van de lokale en internationale wet- en regelgeving op het gebied van gezondheid, veiligheid en milieu? Dan is deze stage iets voor jou!

      Voor deze functie zijn wij op zoek naar een student in de studierichting van Integrale Veiligheidskunde.

      Kortom, jij:

      • Beschikt al over enige kennis, vanuit studie en/of stage, van HSE-regelgeving en -normen;
      • bent analytisch goed onderlegd;
      • kunt vanuit je enthousiasme over je vakgebied, anderen bewust maken van (arbo)veiligheidskwesties;
      • studeert momenteel op HBO niveau in de richting van Integrale Veiligheidskunde;
      • hebt een uitstekende beheersing van de Nederlandse en Engelse taal in woord en geschrift.

      Enza Zaden als jouw stage-werkgever

      Met meer dan 3.000 gepassioneerde collega’s wereldwijd, zetten we ons dagelijks in om de beste groenterassen te ontwikkelen. Ons doel? Zaden leveren die zorgen voor groente met een betere smaak, hogere opbrengsten en een betere resistentie. Tijdens onze missie om de wereld te voeden, streven we ernaar diepere inzichten te krijgen en de volgende doorbraak te vinden. We groeien en innoveren samen en ieders bijdrage hierin is waardevol. Al ruim 85 jaar leiden onze familiewaarden, passie, onafhankelijkheid en focus op innovatie tot succes. Dagelijks eten ruim 480 miljoen mensen onze groenten, iets waar we erg trots op zijn! Onze passie is niet alleen een handelsmerk; het is onze drijvende kracht, die onze snelle groei voortstuwt. Als jij klaar bent voor een volgende stap in een fijne werkomgeving, nodigen we je van harte uit om te solliciteren en je talenten bij ons verder te ontwikkelen. De combinatie van ondernemerschap, initiatief en een gezonde dosis doorzettingsvermogen heeft Enza Zaden gebracht tot waar we nu zijn. Enza Zaden is en blijft in beweging: in het verleden, het heden en de toekomst.

       Wat kun je van ons verwachten

      Als familiebedrijf ondersteunen we je in alle levensgebieden, zodat je succesvol kunt zijn binnen en buiten het werk.

      We bieden:

      • Een aantrekkelijke stagevergoeding;
      • Genoeg vrije dagen (gebaseerd op 24 vrije dagen per jaar);
      • Actieve samenwerking in jouw professionele ontwikkeling (persoonlijke groei);

      Sluit je bij ons aan voor een carrière die met jou meegroeit! Wil je meer weten over Enza Zaden? Klik op deze link naar onze website: Careers

      Laten we in contact komen

      Solliciteer nu via de sollicitatieknop. Je ontvangt binnen enkele minuten een automatische bevestiging en we reageren binnen 10 werkdagen op je sollicitatie voor deze stage.

      Heb je vragen over ons sollicitatieproces? Neem dan gerust contact op met:

      Martine Rook

      Corporate Recruiter

      +31 6 55220474

      m.rook-wijnker@enzazaden.nl

    • Employee Type: Intern (Fixed Term)
    • Prim Recr: Martine Maria Johanna Elisabeth Rook - Wijnker
    • Prim Recr mail: M.Rook-Wijnker@enzazaden.nl
    • Prim Recr Phone: +31 (6) 55220474
    • Int Posting URL: https://wd103.myworkday.com/enzazaden/d/inst/1$9925/9925$3574.htmld

item.title: Product Manager
item.description:
• Job Requisition group
    • Ref ID: JR103684
    • Job Post Loc: Den Haag
    • Country: Netherlands
    • Job Description:

      This is why you want to join us as Product Manager (West European high-tech pepper and cucumber) at Enza Zaden

      Are you passionate about agriculture and eager to make a tangible impact in the industry? Do you thrive in dynamic environments where innovation and collaboration are key? If so, Enza Zaden is the place for you!

      What makes this role different from the competition:

      Innovative Environment: Work with cutting-edge agricultural technologies and contribute to groundbreaking projects.

      • Global Impact: Be part of a team that influences agricultural practices worldwide, ensuring food security and sustainability.

      • Collaborative Culture: Join a supportive and diverse team where your ideas and contributions are valued.

      Make a difference as Product Manager

      In this role, you will be responsible for maximizing market share and gross margin for the high-tech pepper and cucumber market in West European by optimizing variety positioning in close cooperation with the Global Portfolio Management. Your key tasks will include:

      • Analysing regional sales and projections: Align with Subsidiary Sales Managers and the Global Portfolio Manager to ensure regional sales assortment is optimized.

      • Co-creating regional strategic market plans: Develop detailed conventional and organic crop segment plans and provide feedback to Breeders about existing concepts and product models.

      • Leading the product development process in the region: In close cooperation with R&D and our local sales teams you are steering the region process of product development.

      • Advancing variety proposals: Decide on seed allocations and work with the Regional Sales Director for West Europe and Portfolio management to harmonize product and customer packages.

      Team and Workplace

      You will be part of a dynamic West European Product Manager Team, which collaborates closely with the Regional Sales Director, their local sales teams, and the Global Portfolio Management. Our workplace fosters innovation and teamwork, ensuring that every member feels valued and empowered to contribute to our collective success.

      What you bring as a future colleague

      To excel in this role, you will need:

      • Agricultural background: A strong foundation in agriculture is essential. A solid knowledge of the dynamics in West European high-tech fruity markets is desired.

      • Analytical skills: Ability to analyse data and make informed decisions.

      • Persuasive communication skills: Effective communication with various stakeholders.

      • Collaboration skills: Work well within a team to achieve common goals.

      • Your readiness for frequent domestic and regional business travel is required.

      Further Explanation of Soft Skills

      Strong communication and collaboration skills are crucial for this role. You will be interacting with various stakeholders, including the R&D colleagues, local sales teams, and Global Portfolio Managers, to ensure alignment and successful execution of strategic plans. Your ability to work effectively within a team and communicate clearly will be key to your success at Enza Zaden.

      Enza Zaden as your employer

      With more than 3,000 passionate team members across the world, we're on a daily mission to develop the finest vegetable varieties. Our goal? To deliver seeds with that special something: vegetables with better taste, better yields, and better resistance. On our mission to feed the world, we challenge ourselves to gain deeper insights and find the next breakthrough. We grow and innovate together, and everyone’s contribution is valued. Throughout our 86 years, our family values, passion, independence and or focus on innovation have truly set us apart. Over 480 million people are eating our vegetables every day, something we are very proud of! Our passion isn't just a trademark; it's our driving force, propelling our rapid growth. If you're ready to explore your potential and thrive in a supportive environment, we welcome you to develop your talents with us. The combination of entrepreneurship, initiative and a healthy dose of determination has made Enza Zaden great and brought us where we are today. Enza Zaden is and always will be in motion: in the past, present and future.   

      What can you expect from us

      As a family-owned company, we support you to thrive in all areas of life, so that you can be successful inside and outside of work. We offer:

      • Competitive compensation.

      • Flexible work arrangements included remote working place.

      • Lease car.

      • Laptop + smartphone.

      • Employee benefit packages.

      We aspire to be a good employer that cares for our employees, both during and after their careers at Enza Zaden. Our most important benefits include:

      • Active partnership in your professional development (personal growth);

      • Tailor made leadership development programs and global e-learning platform;

      • Employer sponsored retirement benefits.

      Join us for a career that grows with you! Are you curious to know more about Enza Zaden click on this link to our website.

      Get in touch

      Apply now using the application button. You will receive an automatic confirmation of your application within minutes, and we will respond to your application within 10 working days. 

       

      Do you have any questions about our application process? Please feel free to reach out to:

      Sandra Hoeneveld, Corporate Recruiter

      s.hoeneveld-blekkink@enzazaden.nl

      Good to know

      • This position cannot be filled on an interim basis;

      • Enza Zaden is an equal opportunity employer and does not discriminate based on background, identity or personal characteristics;

    • Employee Type: Permanent
    • Prim Recr: Sandra Irene Hoeneveld - Blekkink
    • Prim Recr mail: s.hoeneveld-blekkink@enzazaden.nl
    • Prim Recr Phone: +31 (6) 15540956
    • Int Posting URL: https://wd103.myworkday.com/enzazaden/d/inst/1$9925/9925$3578.htmld

item.title: Especialista en Producto 'Pepinos'_ Centro de México
item.description:
• Job Requisition group
    • Ref ID: JR103712
    • Job Post Loc: Culiacan
    • Country: Mexico
    • Job Description:

      Especialista en Producto ‘Pepinos’- Centro de México

      Product Specialist ‘Cucumbers’- Central Mexico

      ¿Estas listo para contribuir al futuro de Enza Zaden?

      Enza Zaden está en búsqueda de un profesional que muestre iniciativa, capaz de mostrar y promover una imagen positiva de nuestros valores.

      Razones para unirte a Enza Zaden como Especialista en Producto

      • Como Especialista en Producto, apoyaras a que todos en el mundo tengan acceso a una variedad de vegetales saludables; 
      • Te ofrecemos un puesto en el que podrás conectar con equipos locales y globales;
      • Eres una persona que trabaja por objetivos, que sabe trabajar en equipo, organizado y orientado a resultados, con un espíritu emprendedor que te permite reconocer las necesidades y situaciones de importancia en tu trabajo, mismas que deberás reportar inmediatamente. Por ejemplo: situaciones del mercado, enfermedades en las plantas, aspectos inusuales en la ejecución de los ensayos, etc. 

      Tu trabajo como Especialista en Producto

      Serás responsable de establecer diferentes ensayos, evaluar e informar sobre las variedades de los diferentes cultivos asignados, en estrecha colaboración con los diferentes departamentos de mejoramiento genético.

      • Como Especialista en Producto, creas el plan para el establecimiento de los diferentes ensayos de nuevas variedades.
      • Organizas los ensayos en colaboración con el equipo de mejoramiento genético y ventas.
      • Eres responsable de la administración, recopilación y evaluación de datos de los ensayos utilizando los formatos y sistemas establecidos.
      • Deberás seguir los protocolos fitosanitarios en las instalaciones de terceros para garantizar la calidad y el cumplimiento de los ensayos.
      • Analizas, interpretas e informas con reportes sobre las conclusiones y recomendaciones de los ensayos en investigación y desarrollo para el equipo de ventas.
      • Identificas nuevas variedades prometedoras en estado experimental en las diferentes regiones del país.
      • Contribuyes activamente al proceso de toma de decisión de las variedades: con información técnica sobre el desempeño de cada variedad, incluyendo su descripción, localidad de establecimiento y recomendaciones generales del cultivo.
      • Regularmente trabajas bajo presión.
      • Realizas labores en campo en condiciones climatológicas complejas (altas/bajas temperaturas).
      • Realizas trabajo de forma regular en computadora/frente a una pantalla.
      • De manera frecuente viajaras a los lugares donde se pondrán los diferentes ensayos dentro del área geográfica asignada, que comprende los estados de: Guanajuato, Puebla, Zacatecas y San Luis Potosí principalmente.

      Lo que aportaras como nuestro futuro colega

      • Tienes un grado académico profesional de Licenciatura en Ingeniería/Licenciatura en el área de la Agricultura (agronomía o afín).
      • Tienes mínimo de 3-5 años de experiencia laboral en la industria Agrícola o Semillera.
      • Alta capacidad de análisis y sentido de colaboración.
      • Conocimiento técnico en el manejo de cultivos.
      • Conocimiento avanzado del paquete de Microsoft Office (Word, Excel, PowerPoint, Outlook), especialmente en el manejo de Excel.
      • Eres flexible y tienes una actitud positiva antes los cambios.
      • Tienes buenas habilidades de planeación y organización.
      • Eres bilingüe: inglés y español.
      • Disponibilidad para realizar frecuentemente viajes de trabajo, dentro de México a diferentes Estados.

      Como Especialista en Producto, por la naturaleza de las funciones regularmente trabajas bajo presión.

      Enza Zaden como empleador

      Con más de 2,800 miembros apasionados en todo el mundo, estamos en una misión diaria para desarrollar las mejores variedades de vegetales. ¿Nuestro objetivo? Entregar semillas con mejor sabor, mejores rendimientos y mejor resistencia. Como Especialista en Logística, serás parte de un equipo que está haciendo una verdadera diferencia.

      En nuestra misión de alimentar al mundo, nos desafiamos a nosotros mismos para obtener conocimientos más profundos y desarrollar grandes avances. Crecemos e innovamos juntos y se valoran las contribuciones de todos. A lo largo de nuestros 85 años, nuestros valores familiares, pasión, independencia y enfoque en la innovación realmente nos han distinguido. ¡Más de 480 millones de personas están comiendo nuestros vegetales todos los días, algo de lo que estamos muy orgullosos! Nuestra pasión no es solo una marca registrada; es nuestra fuerza impulsora, que impulsa nuestro rápido crecimiento. Si estás listo para explorar tu potencial y prosperar en un entorno de apoyo, te invitamos a desarrollar tus talentos con nosotros. La combinación de emprendimiento, iniciativa y una buena dosis de determinación ha hecho grande a Enza Zaden y nos ha llevado a donde estamos hoy. Enza Zaden está y siempre estará en movimiento: en el pasado, presente y futuro.

      Como empresa familiar, te apoyamos para prosperar en todas las áreas de la vida, para que puedas tener éxito dentro y fuera del trabajo. Queremos hacer que el trabajo funcione.

      ¡Únete a nosotros para una carrera que crece contigo! ¿Tienes curiosidad por saber más sobre Enza Zaden? Haz clic en este enlace para ir al sitio web enlace.

      Ponte en contacto

      Aplica ahora usando el botón de aplicación. Recibirás una confirmación automática de tu solicitud en minutos, y responderemos a tu solicitud dentro de 10 días hábiles.

    • Employee Type: Permanent
    • Prim Recr: Yamara Cervantes Leyva
    • Prim Recr mail: y.cervantes@enzazaden.com.mx
    • Int Posting URL: https://wd103.myworkday.com/enzazaden/d/inst/1$9925/9925$3586.htmld

item.title: Sales Representative & Product Developer
item.description:
• Job Requisition group
    • Ref ID: JR103547
    • Job Post Loc: Lagos Island
    • Country: Nigeria
    • Job Description:

      Sales Representative & Product Developer: Lagos/Kaduna, Nigeria

      Do you have a passion for agriculture and a talent for building strong relationships? We're looking for a Sales Representative & Product Developer to join our Enza Zaden Sales team and help bring cutting-edge varieties to market. If you're excited to work with farmers to deliver high-quality seeds that drive productivity and innovation, keep reading!"

      This is why you want to join us as Sales Representative at Enza Zaden

      ·Innovative product portfolio: "Join a global leader in vegetable breeding that prioritizes innovation and sustainability. State of the art and premium quality vegetable varieties, you’ll be empowered to offer solutions that help growers maximize their yields and achieve long-term success."

      ·Opportunity to build meaningful relationships: "Develop and nurture strong relationships with local farmers, playing a pivotal role in connecting them with high-quality, reliable seeds that support their business goals."

      Make a difference as Sales Representative & Product Developer at Enza Zaden

      As a Sales Representative & Product Developer at Enza Zaden, you bring at least 3 years of sales experience and a strong drive for achieving results. You’ll work with key accounts, selling solutions within our high-quality vegetable seed portfolio. In this role you will need to:

      ·Drive sales success: Meet and exceed sales targets for the sales, leveraging your knowledge to promote our product range effectively.

      ·Develop new business: Identify and pursue new market opportunities, establishing partnerships with growers to expand our footprint and market presence.

      ·Maintain customer relationships: Build and sustain trusted relationships with existing clients, understanding their needs and providing tailored seed solutions.

      ·Troubleshoot and provide support: Address and resolve customer issues promptly, offering reliable support and maintaining high levels of client satisfaction.

      ·Collaborate and innovate: Work closely with internal teams to share market insights and contribute to continuous improvement initiatives.

      ·Product development: Plan, execute and evaluate trials at the growers. Be responsible for trials in sales area.

      What you bring as a future colleague

      ·At least 3 years of sales experience.

      ·Able to effectively communicate in English - requirement

      ·Preferably located in Lagos or Kaduna or willing to relocate

      ·Customer orientated, results, sales driven and works independently.

      ·Strong communication, analytical, collaborative and ability to interact with diverse group of people

      ·Agricultural background and love for working in the field and with plants.

      ·Willingness to travel.

      Enza Zaden as an employer   

      With more than 2,800 passionate team members across the world, we're on a daily mission to develop the finest vegetable varieties. Our goal? To deliver seeds with that special something: better taste, better yields, and better resistance. As Sales Representative & Product Developer, you'll be part of a team making a real difference.

      On our mission to feed the world, we challenge ourselves to gain deeper insights and find the next breakthrough. We grow and innovate together, and everyone’s contribution are valued. Throughout our 85 years, our family values, passion, independence and or focus on innovation have truly set us apart. Over 480 million people are eating our vegetables every day something we are very proud of! Our passion isn't just a trademark; it's our driving force, propelling our rapid growth. If you're ready to explore your potential and thrive in a supportive environment, we welcome you to develop your talents with us. The combination of entrepreneurship, initiative and a healthy dose of determination has made Enza Zaden great and brought us where we are today. Enza Zaden is and always will be in motion: in the past, present and future. 

      Get in touch

      Apply now using the application button. You will receive an automatic confirmation of your application within minutes, and we will respond to your application as soon as possible. 

           

      Good to know

      · An assessment is part of the application process. 

      · This is a fulltime position.

    • Prim Recr mail: s.ngobeni@enzazaden.com

      ·Opportunity to build meaningful relationships: "Develop and nurture strong relationships with local farmers, playing a pivotal role in connecting them with high-quality, reliable seeds that support their business goals."

      Make a difference as Sales Representative & Product Developer at Enza Zaden

      As a Sales Representative & Product Developer at Enza Zaden, you bring at least 3 years of sales experience and a strong drive for achieving results. You’ll work with key accounts, selling solutions within our high-quality vegetable seed portfolio. In this role you will need to:

      ·Drive sales success: Meet and exceed sales targets for the sales, leveraging your knowledge to promote our product range effectively.

      ·Develop new business: Identify and pursue new market opportunities, establishing partnerships with growers to expand our footprint and market presence.

      ·Maintain customer relationships: Build and sustain trusted relationships with existing clients, understanding their needs and providing tailored seed solutions.

      ·Troubleshoot and provide support: Address and resolve customer issues promptly, offering reliable support and maintaining high levels of client satisfaction.

      ·Collaborate and innovate: Work closely with internal teams to share market insights and contribute to continuous improvement initiatives.

      ·Product development: Plan, execute and evaluate trials at the growers. Be responsible for trials in sales area.

      What you bring as a future colleague

      ·At least 3 years of sales experience.

      ·Able to effectively communicate in English - requirement

      ·Preferably located in Dakar or willing to relocate

      ·Customer orientated, results, sales driven and works independently.

      ·Strong communication, analytical, collaborative and ability to interact with diverse group of people

      ·Agricultural background and love for working in the field and with plants.

      ·Willingness to travel.

      Enza Zaden as an employer   

      With more than 2,800 passionate team members across the world, we're on a daily mission to develop the finest vegetable varieties. Our goal? To deliver seeds with that special something: better taste, better yields, and better resistance. As Sales Representative & Product Developer, you'll be part of a team making a real difference.

      On our mission to feed the world, we challenge ourselves to gain deeper insights and find the next breakthrough. We grow and innovate together, and everyone’s contribution are valued. Throughout our 85 years, our family values, passion, independence and or focus on innovation have truly set us apart. Over 480 million people are eating our vegetables every day something we are very proud of! Our passion isn't just a trademark; it's our driving force, propelling our rapid growth. If you're ready to explore your potential and thrive in a supportive environment, we welcome you to develop your talents with us. The combination of entrepreneurship, initiative and a healthy dose of determination has made Enza Zaden great and brought us where we are today. Enza Zaden is and always will be in motion: in the past, present and future. 

      Get in touch

      Apply now using the application button. You will receive an automatic confirmation of your application within minutes, and we will respond to your application as soon as possible. 

           

      Good to know

      · An assessment is part of the application process. 

      · This is a fulltime position.

item.title: Department Assistant (m/w/d)
item.description:
• Job Requisition group
    • Ref ID: JR103493
    • Job Post Loc: Dannstadt-Schauernheim
    • Country: Germany
    • Job Description:

      Department Assistant (m/w/d)

      Als Department Assistant (m/w/d) unterstützt du unser Team im Bereich Station / Facility bei diversen administrativen und koordinierenden Tätigkeiten und trägst damit zu einem reibungslosen Ablauf im Team bei. Bist du bereit für diese verantwortungsvolle Aufgabe? Dann solltest du bei uns starten!

      Das sind deine Aufgaben:

      • Koordination von Instandhaltung: Du übernimmst die präventive Maintenance von Maschinen, Tunneln und Gewächshäusern mithilfe von Excel und geeigneten Softwares.
      • Procurement: Du kümmerst dich um die Beschaffung von Arbeits- und Büromaterialien und unterstützt die Inventur aller Betriebsmittel.
      • Arbeitssicherheit: Du stehst im Kontakt mit unserer Arbeitssicherheitsfirma, führst mit ihnen Gespräche und planst Termine vor Ort. Außerdem hältst du Betriebsanweisungen auf dem neusten Stand, organisierst Schulungen und unterweist neue Mitarbeitende.
      • MPS – CO2 Footprint: Du dokumentierst Verbräuche mit unserem CO2-Footprint-Tool.
      • Arbeitszeiterfassung: Du wertest Arbeitszeiten aus und bist am kontinuierlichen Verbesserungsprozess unseres Systems beteiligt.
      • Organisation Feldtag: Du bist der Hauptkontakt zwischen unserer Abteilung und unserem Marketing & Sales Department und organisierst die Aussteller und Dienstleister bei unserem Feldtag

      Das bringst du für diese Position mit:

      • Abgeschlossene Ausbildung mit Erfahrung im Assistenzbereich
      • Sehr gute Deutsch- und Englischkenntnisse, in Wort und Schrift
      • Sehr gute MS-Office Kenntnisse
      • Eine erfolgreiche Prüfung zum Sicherheitsbeauftragten wäre von Vorteil, ist aber kein Muss
      • Ein gutes technisches Verständnis

      Enza Zaden als Arbeitgeber   

      Mit mehr als 2.800 leidenschaftlichen Teammitgliedern auf der ganzen Welt sind wir täglich auf der Mission, die besten Gemüsesorten zu entwickeln. Unser Ziel? Saatgut mit dem besonderen Etwas zu liefern: besserer Geschmack, bessere Erträge und bessere Widerstandsfähigkeit. Als Department Assistant (m/w/d) bist du Teil eines Teams, das einen echten Unterschied macht.

      Auf unserer Mission, die Welt zu ernähren, fordern wir uns selbst heraus, tiefere Einblicke zu gewinnen und den nächsten Durchbruch zu finden. Wir wachsen, entwickeln neue Ideen und der Beitrag jedes Einzelnen wird geschätzt. In den 85 Jahren, in denen wir tätig sind, haben uns unsere Familienwerte, unsere Leidenschaft, unsere Unabhängigkeit und unser Fokus auf Innovation wirklich von anderen abgehoben. Über 480 Millionen Menschen essen täglich unser Gemüse, worauf wir sehr stolz sind! Unsere Leidenschaft ist nicht nur ein Markenzeichen; sie ist unsere treibende Kraft, die unser schnelles Wachstum vorantreibt. Wenn du bereit bist, dein Potenzial zu entfalten und in einem unterstützenden Umfeld erfolgreich zu sein, laden dich ein, deine Talente bei uns zu entwickeln. Die Kombination aus Unternehmertum, Eigeninitiative und einer gesunden Portion Entschlossenheit hat Enza Zaden groß gemacht und uns dorthin gebracht, wo wir heute sind. Enza Zaden ist und wird immer in Bewegung sein: in der Vergangenheit, Gegenwart und Zukunft.

       Was du von uns erwarten kannst:

      Als Familienunternehmen unterstützen wir dich dabei, in allen Lebensbereichen, innerhalb und außerhalb der Arbeit, erfolgreich zu sein:

      Wir bieten dir:

      • Eine verantwortungsvolle und abwechslungsreiche Aufgabe in einem “grünen” Unternehmen
      • Flexible Arbeitszeiten
      • Ein modernes, lockeres und familiäres Arbeitsumfeld
      • Option eines Dienstfahrrades zur privaten Nutzung
      • 30 Tage Urlaub, Weihnachts- und Urlaubsgeld
      • Ein attraktives Gehalts- und Bonussystem

      Bei Fragen melde dich gerne unter:

      0173 2016369

item.title: Sales Representative & Product Dev.
item.description:
• Job Requisition group
    • Ref ID: JR103448
    • Job Post Loc: Myakka City
    • Country: United States of America
    • Job Description:

      Sales Representative & Product Developer

      Enza Zaden USA is looking for a highly motivated sales professional to join our team in North Carolina.

      What will you do as a Sales Representative & Product Developer?

      As a Sales Representative and Product Developer, you maximize sales and profit with the existing product portfolio. You support the decision-making process and the successful introduction of new varieties.

      • Responsible for the budget, forecast, and pricing within the assigned group of customers and area of responsibility.

      • Responsible for the development and maintenance of business relationships with customers.

      • You provide reliable technical advice to customers to have our varieties successfully grown.

      • You identify new promising experimental varieties from local screening and global Breeding.

      • Support the introduction of new Enza Zaden varieties with technical support and clear positioning towards customers.

      • You accompany sales professionals on calls where appropriate and contribute to the training of less experienced sales representatives in the assigned crop.

      • You independently prepare sales presentations, contracts, and proposals to ensure the successful outcome of transactions.

      • You are an influential team member, who contributes to forming a positive work environment.

      • Other duties as required.

      Your power

      As a Sales Representative & Product Developer, you have a good understanding of how the industry works. You remain up to date about the developments and trends in the market. You are someone who takes initiative, recognizes opportunities, and has an organized method of working. The strong communication and leadership skills you bring help you to build solid relationships between all colleagues. You are a natural communicator and connector who can work independently but is also able to work in cross-functional teams.

      • Minimum of bachelor’s degree preferably in Business, Agriculture, or related field.

      • Minimum 5 years of relevant work experience with a vegetable grower network.

      • Excellent sales skills (gains trust, establishes a business objective, identifies customer needs, explores solutions, develops action plans, and overcomes objections through negotiation).

      • Professional, assertive, with clear communication skills (verbal and written).

      • Strong skills in planning and organization, influencing/persuading and you have strong management skills.

      • Occasional travel, outside North Carolina and international.

      • Must possess a valid driver’s license and clean driving record.

      Estimated salary pay range $85,560 - $103,894.

      Our power

      Enza Zaden is a vegetable breeding company that develops vegetable varieties and produces and sells its seeds all over the world. We have made an animation to explain to you properly (and as briefly as possible) what we do. 

      The purpose of our work? To offer everyone worldwide access to healthy and varied vegetables. With more than 2000 passionate colleagues all over the world, we work together every day on the vegetables of tomorrow. 

      Would you like to know more about Enza Zaden as an employer? Please visit https://www.enzazaden.com/.

    • Prim Recr mail: r.lopez-ortiz@enzazaden.com.mx

item.title: Sales Manager - East Coast
item.description:
• Job Requisition group
    • Ref ID: JR103538
    • Job Post Loc: Myakka City
    • Country: United States of America
    • Job Description:

      SALES MANAGER

      Are you passionate about agribusiness and ready to make an impact?

      Enza Zaden USA is looking for a highly motivated and experienced sales professional to join our team in Florida.

      In this role, you will be responsible for driving sales growth, managing customer relationships, and overseeing the commercial performance of our product portfolio across the East Coast region. You will work closely with another Sales Manager in the same region to ensure optimal coverage and results.

      Why you should join us as a Sales Manager at Enza Zaden

      • Responsible for budgeting, forecasting, and pricing within the assigned market.
      • Co-creation, development, execution, and monitoring of the tactical plans, including the execution of the customer plans within the assigned market, together with Product and Marketing Management.
      • Determination of the customers in cooperation with the subsidiary sales manager, steering, implementation, and execution of (key) customer plans in the assigned market.
      • Collection of market and customer data within the market and supply thereof to the marketing intelligence team, as well as implementation of the region price strategy for the assigned market.

      Make a difference as a Sales Manager

      You have a good understanding of how the industry works and want to be part of a growing company. You are well-spoken, driven and eager to serve our customers efficiently. You lead a team by managing, coaching, and motivating them. You will establish annual goals for each of your direct reports, check in with them to follow up on these goals and provide counseling to achieve optimum performance levels. You stary up to date on market developments, product portfolio, pricing, sales, distribution, marketing, competition and observed trends.

      You will report directly to the Subsidiary Sales Manager in the U.S. and be an integral part of the Sales Management Team.

      What you bring as a future colleague

      You are a dynamic person who takes initiative, recognizes opportunities, and has an organized method of working. You are a natural communicator and connector. You have strong skills in planning and organization, influencing / persuading and management. You can work independently but you are also able to work in cross-functional teams and intercultural project teams.

      • Minimum of bachelor’s degree, preferably in Business, Agriculture or Horticulture.
      • 6+ years of relevant work experience.
      • Excellent sales skills (gains trust, establishes a business objective, identifies customer needs, explores solutions, develops action plans, and overcomes objections through negotiation).
      • Professional, assertive, and clear communication skills (verbal and written).
      • Frequent travel nationally, as well as occasionally internationally (30-40% of the working time).
      • Must possess a valid driver’s license and clean driving record.

      Enza Zaden as an employer

      With more than 2,800 passionate team members across the world, we're on a daily mission to develop the finest vegetable varieties. Our goal? To deliver seeds with that special something: better taste, better yields, and better resistance. As a Sales Manager, you'll be part of a team making a real difference.

      On our mission to feed the world, we challenge ourselves to gain deeper insights and find the next breakthrough. We grow and innovate together, and everyone’s contribution is valued. Throughout our 87 years, our family values, passion, independence and our focus on innovation have truly set us apart. Over 480 million people are eating our vegetables every day, something we are very proud of! Our passion isn't just a trademark; it's our driving force, propelling our rapid growth. If you're ready to explore your potential and thrive in a supportive environment, we welcome you to develop your talents with us. The combination of entrepreneurship, initiative and a healthy dose of determination has made Enza Zaden great and brought us where we are today. Enza Zaden is and always will be in motion: in the past, present and future.

      What you can expect from us

      The following information is provided in good faith as a general description of the starting pay range and benefits for the position posted. The compensation offered to the successful candidate depends on experience, skills, education, work location, and other objective job-related factors.

      Estimated salary pay range: $112,043 - $152,060

      As a family-owned company, we support you to thrive in all areas of life, so that you can be successful inside and outside of work. We offer:

      • An attractive benefits package that includes medical, dental, and vision coverage, life insurance, and disability coverage for full-time positions.
      • Other benefits include 401(k) with employer match,
      • Paid personal time off,
      • Paid volunteer time off,
      • Monthly fitness reimbursement,
      • And a free Employee Assistance Program (EAP).

      More information regarding the benefits will be shared during the application process.

      Get in touch

      Apply now using the application button (no later than June 20th). You will receive an automatic confirmation of your application within minutes, and we will respond to your application within 10 working days.

      Good to know

      An assessment is part of the selection process.
