item.title: Assistant Breeder Cucumber (temporary position for 6 months)
item.description:
• Job Requisition group
    • Ref ID: JR103878
    • Job Post Loc: Enkhuizen
    • Country: Netherlands
    • Job Description:

      This is why you want to join us as Assistant Breeder Cucumber at Enza Zaden

      • Hands-on experience in a dynamic breeding environment where innovation meets nature.

      • Smart and precise work: your eye for detail and curiosity will directly contribute to the development of future cucumber varieties.

      • Supportive team culture: work closely with experienced breeders and technicians who are passionate about their craft.

      Make a difference as Assistant Breeder Cucumber


      As an Assistant Breeder, you’ll play a key role in supporting our cucumber breeding program during a maternity leave period of 6 months. Your work will be a mix of hands-on greenhouse tasks and precise data administration.

      • Learn how a breeding program works and support the breeding team with the daily activities.

      • Perform evaluations in the greenhouse: collect qualitative and quantitative traits in cucumber plants and fruits (e.g. assess plant vigour, measure size and evaluate fruit quality, etc.).

      • Enter data accurately into Excel files and breeding databases.

      • Support the breeder with simple scoring rounds and trait evaluations.

      • Collaborate with the team to ensure smooth trial execution and data collection.

      You’ll be part of a dedicated breeding team based in Enkhuizen, working closely with breeders and technicians. You’ll report to the Senior Breeder Cucumber and be surrounded by colleagues who are just as curious and detail-oriented as you are.

      What you bring as a future colleague

      • Bachelor's degree level of thinking

      • You are precise and structured in your work — accuracy is your second nature.

      • You are curious and observant — you enjoy discovering patterns and asking questions.

      • You are comfortable working with Excel and digital tools for data entry.

      • You have an interest in plants, breeding, or horticulture — experience is a plus, but not a must.

      • You are a team player who communicates clearly and works well with others.

      • You are smart and eager to learn — you pick things up quickly and take initiative.

      • English is necessary, Dutch is a pre.

      Given the temporary nature of this role (6 months), we are open to candidates who are currently based in the Netherlands. You are available to start on September 1st.

      Enza Zaden as your employer

      With more than 3,000 passionate team members across the world, we're on a daily mission to develop the finest vegetable varieties. Our goal? To deliver seeds with that special something: better taste, better yields, and better resistance. On our mission to feed the world, we challenge ourselves to gain deeper insights and find the next breakthrough. We grow and innovate together, and everyone’s contribution are valued. Throughout our 85 years, our family values, passion, independence and or focus on innovation have truly set us apart. Over 480 million people are eating our vegetables every day something we are very proud of! Our passion isn't just a trademark; it's our driving force, propelling our rapid growth. If you're ready to explore your potential and thrive in a supportive environment, we welcome you to develop your talents with us. The combination of entrepreneurship, initiative and a healthy dose of determination has made Enza Zaden great and brought us where we are today. Enza Zaden is and always will be in motion: in the past, present and future.

      What can you expect from us?

      As a family-owned company, we support you to thrive in all areas of life, so that you can be successful inside and outside of work. We offer:

      • Access to a variety of wellbeing programs and healthy food options;

      • 25 paid vacation days (employees have the option to buy extra vacation days equivalent to two times their weekly working hours);

      • 1 paid vitality day for all, plus extra days as your age increases;

      Are you curious to know more about Enza Zaden click on this link to our website.

      Get in touch

      Apply now using the application button. You will receive an automatic confirmation of your application within minutes, and we will respond to your application within 10 working days.

      Do you have any questions about our application process? Please feel free to reach out to:

      Annemarie Weening, Senior Corporate Recruiter (a.weening@enzazaden.nl).

      Acquisition in response to this vacancy is not appreciated.

item.title: Analist/Laborant Moleculaire Technieken
item.description:
• Job Requisition group
    • Ref ID: JR103921
    • Job Post Loc: Enkhuizen
    • Country: Netherlands
    • Job Description:

      Wil jij bijdragen aan gezonde groentezaden wereldwijd in een afwisselende laboratoriumrol?

      Dit is waarom je als Analist/Laborant Moleculaire Technieken bij Enza Zaden wil komen werken.

      • Je speelt een sleutelrol in het opsporen van pathogenen in zaden en bladmateriaal van over de hele wereld – cruciaal voor het telen van gezonde planten.

      • Je werkt in een innovatief laboratorium met diverse analysetechnieken.(o.a PCR en ELISA)

      • Je krijgt ruimte om jezelf te ontwikkelen en door te groeien binnen de organisatie

      • Je hebt een veelzijdige functie met veel verantwoordelijkheid en impact.

      Maak het verschil als bij de afdeling Seed Health als Analist/Laborant Moleculaire Technieken

      Ben jij nauwkeurig, nieuwsgierig en heb je affiniteit met moleculaire en immunologische technieken? Dan is deze functie iets voor jou!

      Als laborant op de afdeling Seed Health test je groentezaden en bladmateriaal afkomstig uit alle delen van de wereld. Dankzij jouw werk kunnen deze zaden uitgroeien tot gezonde planten. Zo draag je bij aan een betrouwbare voedselvoorziening en zorg je ervoor dat er voldoende verse groenten beschikbaar zijn voor consumenten wereldwijd.

      Om de kwaliteit van onze groentezaden te waarborgen, test je op de afdeling Seed Health plantmateriaal op de aanwezigheid van schadelijke pathogenen. Daarbij maak je gebruik van diverse analysetechnieken, en werk je volgens vastgestelde protocollen en processen.

      We zoeken een echte allrounder: iemand die zowel inzetbaar is binnen het PCR-proces als het ELISA-proces. Afwisseling en samenwerking staan hierbij centraal.

      Hoe ziet jouw werkdag eruit?
      Bij aankomst trek jij je labjas aan en stap je het laboratorium binnen. Op het planbord in de gang zie je direct wat er die dag van je wordt verwacht. Je werkt in een moderne labomgeving, waar geen dag hetzelfde is. De ene keer bereid je zelfstandig een test voor, de andere keer werk je samen met een collega aan routinematige toetsen. Ook kan het zijn dat je een RNA-isolatie opstart met behulp van onze robot.

      Wat ga je doen als Analist/Laborant bij Seed Health?

      Je bent verantwoordelijk voor:

      • Het testen van groentezaden op bacteriën, virussen en viroïden met behulp van diverse analysetechnieken.

      • Het beoordelen van testresultaten en het zorgvuldig vastleggen ervan in ons LIMS-systeem.

      • Het ondersteunen bij procesverbeteringen en het bewaken van de kwaliteit.

      • Samenwerken binnen een dynamisch team dat zich richt op moleculaire en immunologische analyses.

      Je bent betrokken bij het volledige proces: van voorbereiding tot analyse en rapportage. Daardoor is je werkdag afwisselend en uitdagend. Is het rustig binnen jouw team? Dan spring je bij waar nodig binnen de afdeling Seed Health. Daarnaast ondersteun je de Process Supervisor bij het optimaliseren van processen en protocollen.

      Ben je ambitieus, leergierig en klaar voor een volgende of nieuwe stap? Dan zijn er bij ons volop doorgroeimogelijkheden.

      🎥 Nieuwsgierig naar je toekomstige werkplek? Neem alvast een kijkje in ons Seed Health-lab: https://youtu.be/4_czZVzUji0

      Wat jij meebrengt als toekomstige collega


      Als onze ideale nieuwe collega beschik je over:

      • Een mbo-4 diploma in Middelbaar Laboratoriumonderwijs (MLO).

      • Sterke sociale vaardigheden en een echte teamspirit.

      • Een nauwkeurige, gestructureerde werkwijze en oog voor detail.

      • Een goede beheersing van de Nederlandse en Engelse taal, zowel mondeling als schriftelijk.

      Enza Zaden als jouw werkgever

      Met meer dan 2.800 gepassioneerde collega’s wereldwijd, zetten we ons dagelijks in voor de ontwikkeling van hoogwaardige groentezaden. Ons doel is helder: zaden leveren die niet alleen beter smaken, maar ook hogere opbrengsten en verbeterde resistentie bieden. Tijdens onze missie om de wereld te voeden, streven we ernaar diepere inzichten te verwerven en de volgende doorbraak te vinden. We groeien en innoveren samen, en elke bijdrage wordt gewaardeerd. Gedurende onze 85 jaar hebben onze familiewaarden, passie, onafhankelijkheid en/of focus op innovatie ons geleid tot succes. Meer dan 480 miljoen mensen eten dagelijks onze groenten, iets waar we erg trots op zijn! Onze passie is niet alleen een handelsmerk; het is onze drijvende kracht, die onze snelle groei voortstuwt. Als jij klaar bent voor een volgende stap in een fijne werkomgeving, nodigen we je van harte uit om te solliciteren en je talenten bij ons verder te ontwikkelen. De combinatie van ondernemerschap, initiatief en een gezonde dosis vastberadenheid heeft Enza Zaden groot gemaakt en ons gebracht waar we nu zijn. Enza Zaden is en blijft in beweging: in het verleden, het heden en de toekomst.

      Wat kun je van ons verwachten

      Als familiebedrijf ondersteunen we je in alle levensgebieden, zodat je succesvol kunt zijn binnen en buiten het werk. We bieden:

      • Reiskostenvergoeding bij +10 kilometer woon-/werkafstand op basis van Google Maps

      • 8,33% vakantiegeld

      • Performance reward percentage

      • Individuele en collectieve salarisverhoging

      • 25 vakantiedagen + 1 vitaliteitsdag (overige vitaliteitsdagen zijn afhankelijk van leeftijd)

      • Bijdrage pensioenregeling

      Sluit je bij ons aan voor een carrière die met jou meegroeit! Wil je meer weten over Enza Zaden?

      Laten we in contact komen

      Solliciteer nu via de sollicitatieknop. Je ontvangt binnen enkele minuten een automatische bevestiging van je aanvraag, en we reageren binnen 10 werkdagen op je aanvraag.

      Heb je vragen over ons sollicitatieproces? Neem dan gerust contact op met:

      Arjen Mol, Recruiter

      a.mol@enzazaden.nl

      Goed om te weten

      • Enza Zaden is een werkgever die gelijke kansen biedt en discrimineert niet op basis van achtergrond, identiteit of persoonlijke kenmerken;

      • Een veiligheidscontrole maakt deel uit van het wervingsproces.

      Acquisitie naar aanleiding van deze vacature wordt niet op prijs gesteld.

    • Employee Type: Fixed Term (Fixed Term)
    • Prim Recr: Sandra Irene Hoeneveld - Blekkink
    • Prim Recr mail: s.hoeneveld-blekkink@enzazaden.nl
    • Prim Recr Phone: +31 (6) 15540956

item.title: Senior Researcher Seed Diagnostics
item.description:
• Job Requisition group
    • Ref ID: JR103914
    • Job Post Loc: Enkhuizen
    • Country: Netherlands
    • Job Description:

      Do you want to contribute to bring healthy seeds to vegetable growers world-wide? Are you looking for an opportunity within a family-owned company in a global and highly competitive Vegetable Seed business? Are you passionate about researching novel technologies to seed pathogen detection and seeing these technologies applied? Does leading and coaching people and teams give you lots of energy?

      This is why you want to join us as Senior Researcher Seed Diagnostics at Enza Zaden

      • Work with state-of-the-art diagnostic tools that directly impact the health of the global food supply.

      • Collaborate with leading experts in seed health laboratories worldwide.

      • Be part of a mission-driven team ensuring high-quality vegetable seeds reach our customers in an entrepreneurial environment.

      Make a difference as Senior Researcher Seed Diagnostics

      • Lead and coach a team of experts in the field of seed health diagnostics;

      • Scout for and evaluate cutting-edge diagnostic technologies and develop and help implementing advanced test protocols;

      • Lead cross-functional research projects and collaborate with internal teams and external partners to ensure ENZA stays on top of developments in the field of seed health diagnostics;

      • Contribute to global seed health initiatives in a highly competitive and enterpreneurial commercial environment.

      You will be part of the Seed Diagnostics Research team, within the Seed Research & Innovation department of Enza Zaden. This international team of researchers develops and validates innovative technologies to maintain the health of our vegetable seeds. Together with our global seed quality control labs, you ensure that only the best-quality seeds reach our customers. You will collaborate with internal departments, universities, and research centres, reporting to the Global Manager Seed Diagnostics.

      What you bring as a future colleague

      • PhD or Master’s degree in plant pathology, biotechnology, or microbiology, with at least 8 years of post educational experience; experience in the seed industry is a must;

      • Proven track record in leading and coaching people, with a focus on personal development;

      • A strong drive for working with plants and expertise in seed/plant pathology;

      • Demonstrated experience with diverse (molecular) pathogen detection methodologies while bringing these to implementation;

      • Experience in the initiation, preparation and launch of programs of (new) approaches and/or technologies, including stakeholder management;

      • Collaborative mindset and ease in working on multidisciplinary, multicultural teams to deliver results;

      • Strong communication skills in English; knowledge of Dutch is a plus;

      • Occasional travel to internal or external meetings and conferences worldwide is required.

      You do not only have a strong technical background, but are an effective communicator and team leader. You are resilient, you thrive in a dynamic, enterpreneurial, business environment. You connect easily with others and are decisive, ensuring progress even under challenging circumstances.

      Enza Zaden as your employer

      With more than 3,000 passionate team members across the world, we're on a daily mission to develop the finest vegetable varieties. Our goal? To deliver seeds with that special something: vegetables with better taste, better yields, and better resistance. On our mission to feed the world, we challenge ourselves to gain deeper insights and find the next breakthrough. We grow and innovate together, and everyone’s contribution is valued. Throughout our 86 years, our family values, passion, independence and our focus on innovation have truly set us apart. Over 480 million people eat our vegetables every day, something we are very proud of! Our passion isn't just a trademark; it's our driving force, propelling our rapid growth. If you're ready to explore your potential and thrive in a supportive environment, we welcome you to develop your talents with us. The combination of entrepreneurship, initiative and a healthy dose of determination has made Enza Zaden great and brought us where we are today. Enza Zaden is and always will be in motion: in the past, present and future.

      What can you expect from us

      As a family-owned company, we support you to thrive in all areas of life, so that you can be successful inside and outside of work. We offer:

      • Flexible work arrangements;

      • Access to a variety of well-being programs and healthy food options;

      • 25 paid vacation days (employees have the option to buy extra vacation days equivalent to two times their weekly working hours);

      • 1 paid vitality day for all, plus extra days as your age increases;

      • Laptop + smartphone.

      We aspire to be a good employer that cares for our employees, both during and after their careers at Enza Zaden. Our most important benefits include:

      • Active partnership in your professional development (personal growth);

      • Tailor made leadership development programs and global e-learning platform;

      • Employer sponsored retirement benefits.

      Join us for a career that grows with you! Are you curious to know more about Enza Zaden click on this link to our website.

      Get in touch

      Apply now using the application button. You will receive an automatic confirmation of your application within minutes, and we will respond to your application within 10 working days. 

       

      Do you have any questions about our application process? Please feel free to reach out to: Marjolijn Woudstra, Senior Recruitment Business Partner a.i., m.woudstra@enzazaden.nl  

      Good to know

      • A business case assessment is part of the application process;

      • This position cannot be filled on an interim basis;

      • Enza Zaden is an equal opportunity employer and does not discriminate based on background, identity or personal characteristics.

item.title: Warehouse and Stock Planner
item.description:
• Job Requisition group
    • Ref ID: JR103224
    • Job Post Loc: Evesham
    • Country: United Kingdom
    • Job Description:

      This is why you want to join us as Warehouse and Stock Planner at Enza Zaden

      • Play a critical role in ensuring the timely delivery of high-quality vegetable seeds to customers.
      • Collaborate with cross-functional teams to optimise logistics and inventory management processes.
      • Work in a dynamic, international environment where your contributions make a real impact.

      Make a difference as Warehouse and Stock Planner

      As Logistics and Inventory Specialist, you will oversee the efficient management of our seed inventory and logistics processes. Your key responsibilities will include:

      • Managing inventory by allocating seed lots to customer orders and assessing inventory for destroy or credit actions.
      • Ensuring timely placement of intercompany transfer orders to meet forecasted sales.
      • Coordinating import and export processes, ensuring compliance with regulations and accurate documentation.
      • Overseeing inventory receipt and release for internal processing.
      • Storing and managing quality-related information, documentation, and certifications in designated systems.
      • Providing accurate and timely responses to internal customer inquiries about product information and availability.

      You’ll work full-time, closely with the Customer Service, Sales, Warehousing, and Accounting teams to ensure seamless order handling and fulfilment. Externally, you’ll collaborate with forwarders and carriers to manage shipment details.

      What you bring as a future colleague

      We’re looking for a candidate with:

      • A higher level education individual preferably with an agricultural background or knowledge.
      • 3 to 5 years of relevant experience in logistics, inventory management, or a similar role.
      • Knowledge of import and export regulations for domestic and international shipments is preferable, or willing to learn.
      • Proficiency in Microsoft Office applications required and familiarity with forecasting and planning software, also preferable.
      • Mother language - English.
      • Located within suitable traveling distance to the Evesham area, United Kingdom.
      • Hold a full UK driving licence and UK VISA.

      In addition to these qualifications, we value a proactive mindset, attention to detail, and the ability to work effectively under pressure both under guidance and own initiative.

      Compensation will be based on qualifications and experience.

      Enza Zaden as your employer

      With more than 3,000 passionate team members across the world, we're on a daily mission to develop the finest vegetable varieties. Our goal? To deliver seeds with that special something: vegetables with better taste, better yields, and better resistance. On our mission to feed the world, we challenge ourselves to gain deeper insights and find the next breakthrough. We grow and innovate together, and everyone’s contribution is valued. Throughout our 86 years, our family values, passion, independence, and focus on innovation have truly set us apart. Over 480 million people eat our vegetables every day, something we are very proud of! Our passion isn't just a trademark; it's our driving force, propelling our rapid growth. If you're ready to explore your potential and thrive in a supportive environment, we welcome you to develop your talents with us. The combination of entrepreneurship, initiative, and a healthy dose of determination has made Enza Zaden great and brought us where we are today. Enza Zaden is and always will be in motion: in the past, present, and future.

      What can you expect from us

      As a family-owned company, we support you to thrive in all areas of life so that you can be successful inside and outside of work. We offer:

      • Friendly and supportive working environment.
      • Laptop.
      • Health insurance.
      • Pension plan.
      • Discretionary company performance bonus scheme.
      • Tailor-made development programs and a global e-learning platform.
      • A challenge and opportunity to develop yourself within our business.

      Join us for a career that grows with you! Are you curious to know more about Enza Zaden? Click on this link to our website.

      Get in touch

      Apply now using the application button. You will receive an automatic confirmation of your application within minutes, and we will respond to your application soon.

      Adele Lamagna

      HR Business Partner – Italy / UK

item.title: HR Operations Coordinator
item.description:
• Job Requisition group
    • Ref ID: JR103911
    • Job Post Loc: Enkhuizen
    • Country: Netherlands
    • Job Description:

      Dit is waarom je als HR Operations Coördinator bij Enza Zaden wil komen werken

      • Je werkt in een enthousiast HR Operations team, waarbij wij hét 1e HR-aanspreekpunt zijn voor managers en medewerkers van Enza Zaden.

      • Je krijgt de kans om mee te werken aan verbeteringsprojecten en de verdere digitaliseringsreis van het HR-team voort te zetten.

      • Je speelt een cruciale rol in het verder professionaliseren van het Global HR beleid binnen Enza Zaden.

      Maak het verschil als HR Operations Coördinator

      • De uitvoering van een accurate personeelsadministratie in de HR-systemen.

      • Het tijdig en correct verwerken van in- en uitdiensttredingen, opstellen van arbeidscontracten en verzorgen van diverse personele mutaties zoals functiewijzigingen, salarisaanpassingen, etc.

      • Het versturen en ontvangen van diverse HR-documenten.

      • Het beantwoorden van eerstelijns HR vragen over de cao, arbeidsvoorwaarden, contracten, personeelsregelingen, procedures, verloning, etc.

      • Een actieve deelname aan digitalisatie- en optimalisatie projecten.

      • Een actieve deelname aan payroll controles en validatie.

      Je werkt in een groeiend internationaal HR-team, waarbij een stabiel HR Operations team van belang is voor het verder professionaliseren van het Global HR beleid binnen Enza Zaden.

      Wat jij meebrengt als toekomstige collega

      • Je vindt het leuk om in een enthousiast HR-team te werken en collega’s te helpen met antwoorden over vragen omtrent de CAO, arbeidsvoorwaarden, diverse regelingen, etc.

      • Je hebt tenminste een mbo-4 of hbo-diploma, bij voorkeur op HR-vlak.

      • Je beschikt over minimaal 1 jaar stage/werkervaring in een HR gerichte soortgelijke functie.

      • Je bent zeer bedreven met het werken in verschillende systemen (ervaring met WorkDay, TOPdesk en/of Talent & Salaris geldt als een pré).

      • Je beschikt over goede communicatieve vaardigheden en beheerst vloeiend de Nederlandse taal zowel in woord als geschrift, ook beheers je de Engelse taal in zowel woord als geschrift.

      Enza Zaden als jouw werkgever 

      Met meer dan 3.000 gepassioneerde collega’s wereldwijd, zetten we ons dagelijks in om de beste groenterassen te ontwikkelen. Ons doel? Zaden leveren die zorgen voor groente met een betere smaak, hogere opbrengsten en een betere resistentie. Tijdens onze missie om de wereld te voeden, streven we ernaar diepere inzichten te krijgen en de volgende doorbraak te vinden. We groeien en innoveren samen en ieders bijdrage hierin is waardevol. Al ruim 86 jaar leiden onze familiewaarden, passie, onafhankelijkheid en focus op innovatie tot succes. Dagelijks eten ruim 480 miljoen mensen onze groenten, iets waar we enorm trots op zijn! Onze passie is niet alleen een handelsmerk; het is onze drijvende kracht, die onze snelle groei voortstuwt. Als jij klaar bent voor een volgende stap in een fijne werkomgeving, nodigen we je van harte uit om te solliciteren en je talenten bij ons verder te ontwikkelen. De combinatie van ondernemerschap, initiatief en een gezonde dosis doorzettingsvermogen heeft Enza Zaden gebracht tot waar we nu zijn. Enza Zaden is en blijft in beweging: in het verleden, het heden en de toekomst.

      Wat kun je van ons verwachten 

      Als familiebedrijf ondersteunen we je in alle levensgebieden, zodat je succesvol kunt zijn binnen en buiten het werk. We bieden:

      • Flexibele werkregelingen;

      We streven ernaar een goede werkgever te zijn die om medewerkers geeft, zowel tijdens als na hun carrière bij Enza Zaden. Onze belangrijkste voordelen zijn onder andere:

item.title: Global Manager Compliance & Corporate Affairs
item.description:
• Job Requisition group
    • Ref ID: JR103824
    • Job Post Loc: Enkhuizen
    • Country: Netherlands
    • Job Description:

      With your corporate and compliance experience, are you ready to shape the future of innovation and sustainability in agriculture? 🌱

      Why you want to work with us as Global Manager Compliance & Corporate Affairs at Enza Zaden:

      • Global Impact: Ensure effective corporate governance (70%) and legal compliance (30%) across our entities worldwide. When we refer to compliance, we mean business ethics, sanctions, anti-bribery and corruption, privacy etc. We are present with our own facilities in over 27 countries worldwide across all continents.

      • Strategic Influence: Play a key role in developing and executing our compliance program and corporate affairs strategy.

      • Leadership Opportunities: Lead, motivate, and develop a high-performing team of three.

      Make a difference as Global Manager Compliance & Corporate Affairs

      • Establish, manage and maintain effective corporate governance structures, inter- company agreements, identify liability risks and optimize authorization. In our growing company our current ways of working and organizational setup are constantly being reviewed and optimized. You also play a crucial role in acquisitions.

      • Drive further development and implementation of the global compliance program to ensure adherence to relevant regulations across the Enza Zaden group and perform SpeakUp investigations if needed.

      • Further build and shape the team and encourage and support the growth of your team.

      • With your hands-on mentality, you draft, negotiate, review, and adjust agreements related to corporate and compliance matters. Provide expert advice on legal risks and solutions to support organizational growth.

      About the Team

      You will be part of a dynamic and inspiring team that values collaboration and innovation and work together from different legal perspectives in order to achieve its common goal: the implementation of a solid legal structure throughout the organization. Reporting to the General Counsel, you will work closely with board members, senior management, and relevant Committees (Risk Advisory Committee and Integrity Committee). Our workplace fosters innovation and teamwork, ensuring you have the support you need to succeed.

      What you bring as a future colleague

      • Masters degree in law

      • Experience: + 12 years in legal compliance and corporate governance in an international environment.

      • Leadership Skills: Proven leadership capabilities and people skills with cultural awareness.

      • Influencing Skills: Persuasiveness and influencing skills towards BoD and senior management.

      • Cultural awareness: Given our global footprint, cultural awareness and cross-cultural collaboration experience are highly valued.

      • Team player: you enjoy collaborating with the business and your colleagues in the legal department.

      In addition to these skills, we value a positive attitude and willingness to learn if you have less experience in some areas. Your ability to collaborate with diverse teams across the globe and your passion for your expertise will be key to your success in this role.

      Enza Zaden as your employer  

      With more than 3.000 passionate team members across the world, we are on a daily mission to develop the finest vegetable varieties. Our goal? To deliver seeds with that special something: vegetables with better taste, better yields, and better resistance. On our mission to feed the world, we challenge ourselves to gain deeper insights and find the next breakthrough. We grow and innovate together, and everyone’s contribution is valued. Throughout our 87 years, our family values, passion, independence, and our focus on innovation have truly set us apart. Over 480 million people eat our vegetables every day, something we are very proud of! Our passion isn't just a trademark; it's our driving force, propelling our rapid growth. If you're ready to explore your potential and thrive in a supportive environment, we welcome you to develop your talents with us. The combination of entrepreneurship, initiative, and a healthy dose of determination has made Enza Zaden great and brought us where we are today. Enza Zaden is and always will be in motion: in the past, present and future.

      • Access to a variety of wellbeing programs and healthy food options; 

      • Contribute for overnight stays if you live far away from Enza Zaden.

        

      We aspire to be a good employer that cares for our employees, both during and after their careers at Enza Zaden. Our most important benefits include:

      • Employer sponsored retirement benefits.
